wikipedia_page.main: Jennifer Evans (born 26 November 1982) is a Welsh actress, best known for playing the lead role of estranged Welsh farm girl Cat Williams in the 2005 award-winning (BIFA Raindance Award) horror/comedy feature film Evil Aliens.She has been cast as The Nurse in a forthcoming adaptation of House of Hell.

response: The film features an ensemble cast including TV presenter Emily Booth, Jamie Honeybourne, Christopher Adamson, Norman Lovett, Scott Joseph, model Jodie Shaw, and Jennifer Evans.
